row.process:
@echo off
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_PARAM_LOG : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Filter" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FILTER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Format" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FORMAT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@WIN : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT('docker', ' &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service ls ') ! Use --filter if tag given : IF &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FILTER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FILTER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#, ' --filter &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#') : ENDIF
! Use --format if tag given : IF &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FORMAT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FORMAT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#, ' --format &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#') : ENDIF ! LOGGING COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING LIST SERVICES COMMAND: &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#"
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LIST SERVICES ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LIST SERVICES ACTION FAILED ********"
! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#
IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR EXIT /B %ERRORLEVEL% )
: SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT('docker', ' &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service ls ') : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FILTER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#, ' --filter &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#')
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion SET list1= SET list2= for /F "skip=1 tokens=1,2 delims= " %%i in ('&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#') do ( if "!list1!" == "" ( set list1=%%i set list2=%%j set/a count=1 ) else ( set list1=!list1!,%%i set list2=!list2!,%%j set/a count=!count!+1 ) )
echo UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS::=%list1% echo UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES::=%list2% echo UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES::=%count% endlocal
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN

row.post_process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS# = "" :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES# = "" :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES# = "&VALUE#" : ENDSWITCH
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES#,,"WORKFLOW"
